Package org.springframework.beans.factory.support

Classes supporting the org.springframework.beans.factory package.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
BeanFactoryLoader Interface to be implemented by objects that can load BeanFactories (usually on behalf of application components such as EJBs).
 

Class Summary
AbstractBeanDefinition Internal BeanFactory implementation class.
AbstractBeanFactory Abstract superclass that makes implementing a BeanFactory very easy.
AbstractFactoryBean Convenient superclass for FactoryBean implementations.
BeanFactoryBootstrap One singleton to rule them all
BeanFactoryUtils Convenience methods operating on bean factories.
ChildBeanDefinition Extension of BeanDefinition interface for beans whose class is defined by their ancestry.
ListableBeanFactoryImpl Concrete implementation of ListableBeanFactory.
ManagedList Tag subclass used to hold managed elements, which may include runtime bean references
ManagedMap Tag subclass used to hold managed values, which may include runtime bean references
PropertiesFactoryBean Allows for making a properties file from a classpath location available as Properties instance in a bean factory.
RootBeanDefinition Root bean definitions have a class and properties.
RuntimeBeanReference Immutable placeholder class used for the value of a PropertyValue object when it's a reference to another bean in this factory to be resolved at runtime.
StaticListableBeanFactory Singleton only.
 

Exception Summary
BootstrapException  
 

Package org.springframework.beans.factory.support Description

Classes supporting the org.springframework.beans.factory package. Contains abstract base classes for BeanFactory implementations.
